column2: I think it's a tourist trap and unfortunately I fell into it. Second
column3: it takes FOREVER to get the pizza even if you order before being seated. Our pizza took an hour! When you finally get the pizza
column4: you can't eat more than once slice because its super cheesy and not in a good way. The cheese was way too chewy and rubbery almost. The crust is so odd. I should've listened to our Lyft driver who told us not to go there! The only thing I did like was the sauce..that was ok. Immediately after eating my one chewy slice of pizza
column5: I felt super gross! I ended up throwing up 2 hours later and had major tummy troubles! IT WAS A NIGHTMARE!
